PoolAddParameter PoolAddParameter Class

In this Article

Edit

A pool in the Azure Batch service to add.

Syntax

PoolAddParameter(String, String, String, CloudServiceConfiguration, VirtualMachineConfiguration, Nullable(Of TimeSpan), Nullable(Of Int32), Nullable(Of Boolean), String, Nullable(Of TimeSpan), Nullable(Of Boolean), NetworkConfiguration, StartTask, IList(Of CertificateReference), IList(Of ApplicationPackageReference), Nullable(Of Int32), TaskSchedulingPolicy, IList(Of UserAccount), IList(Of MetadataItem))

Properties summary

ApplicationPackageReferences
ApplicationPackageReferences

Gets or sets the list of application packages to be installed on each compute node in the pool.
AutoScaleEvaluationInterval
AutoScaleEvaluationInterval

Gets or sets the time interval at which to automatically adjust the pool size according to the autoscale formula.
AutoScaleFormula
AutoScaleFormula

Gets or sets a formula for the desired number of compute nodes in the pool.
CertificateReferences
CertificateReferences

Gets or sets the list of certificates to be installed on each compute node in the pool.
CloudServiceConfiguration
CloudServiceConfiguration

Gets or sets the cloud service configuration for the pool.
DisplayName
DisplayName

Gets or sets the display name for the pool.
EnableAutoScale
EnableAutoScale

Gets or sets whether the pool size should automatically adjust over time.
EnableInterNodeCommunication
EnableInterNodeCommunication

Gets or sets whether the pool permits direct communication between nodes.
Id
Id

Gets or sets a string that uniquely identifies the pool within the account.
MaxTasksPerNode
MaxTasksPerNode

Gets or sets the maximum number of tasks that can run concurrently on a single compute node in the pool.
Metadata
Metadata

Gets or sets a list of name-value pairs associated with the pool as metadata.
NetworkConfiguration
NetworkConfiguration

Gets or sets the network configuration for the pool.
ResizeTimeout
ResizeTimeout

Gets or sets the timeout for allocation of compute nodes to the pool.
StartTask
StartTask

Gets or sets a task specified to run on each compute node as it joins the pool.
TargetDedicated
TargetDedicated

Gets or sets the desired number of compute nodes in the pool.
TaskSchedulingPolicy
TaskSchedulingPolicy

Gets or sets how the Batch service distributes tasks between compute nodes in the pool.
UserAccounts
UserAccounts

Gets or sets the list of user accounts to be created on each node in the pool.
VirtualMachineConfiguration
VirtualMachineConfiguration

Gets or sets the virtual machine configuration for the pool.
VmSize
VmSize

Gets or sets the size of virtual machines in the pool. All virtual machines in a pool are the same size.

    PoolAddParameter(String, String, String, CloudServiceConfiguration, VirtualMachineConfiguration, Nullable<TimeSpan>, Nullable<Int32>, Nullable<Boolean>, String, Nullable<TimeSpan>, Nullable<Boolean>, NetworkConfiguration, StartTask, IList<CertificateReference>, IList<ApplicationPackageReference>, Nullable<Int32>, TaskSchedulingPolicy, IList<UserAccount>, IList<MetadataItem>)

    Initializes a new instance of the PoolAddParameter class.

    public PoolAddParameter(string id, string vmSize, string displayName = null, CloudServiceConfiguration cloudServiceConfiguration = null, VirtualMachineConfiguration virtualMachineConfiguration = null, TimeSpan? resizeTimeout = null, int ? targetDedicated = null, bool ? enableAutoScale = null, string autoScaleFormula = null, TimeSpan? autoScaleEvaluationInterval = null, bool ? enableInterNodeCommunication = null, NetworkConfiguration networkConfiguration = null, StartTask startTask = null, IList<CertificateReference> certificateReferences = null, IList<ApplicationPackageReference> applicationPackageReferences = null, int ? maxTasksPerNode = null, TaskSchedulingPolicy taskSchedulingPolicy = null, IList<UserAccount> userAccounts = null, IList<MetadataItem> metadata = null)Public Sub New(id As String, vmSize As String, displayName As String = Nothing, cloudServiceConfiguration As CloudServiceConfiguration = Nothing, virtualMachineConfiguration As VirtualMachineConfiguration = Nothing, resizeTimeout As TimeSpan? = Nothing, targetDedicated As Integer? = Nothing, enableAutoScale As Boolean? = Nothing, autoScaleFormula As String = Nothing, autoScaleEvaluationInterval As TimeSpan? = Nothing, enableInterNodeCommunication As Boolean? = Nothing, networkConfiguration As NetworkConfiguration = Nothing, startTask As StartTask = Nothing, certificateReferences As IList(Of CertificateReference) = Nothing, applicationPackageReferences As IList(Of ApplicationPackageReference) = Nothing, maxTasksPerNode As Integer? = Nothing, taskSchedulingPolicy As TaskSchedulingPolicy = Nothing, userAccounts As IList(Of UserAccount) = Nothing, metadata As IList(Of MetadataItem) = Nothing)

    Parameters

    • id
      String
      String

      A string that uniquely identifies the pool within the account.

    • vmSize
      String
      String

      The size of virtual machines in the pool. All virtual machines in a pool are the same size.

    • displayName
      String
      String

      The display name for the pool.

    • cloudServiceConfiguration
      CloudServiceConfiguration
      CloudServiceConfiguration

      The cloud service configuration for the pool.

    • virtualMachineConfiguration

      VirtualMachineConfiguration

      The virtual machine configuration for the pool.

      Nullable<TimeSpan>
      Nullable(Of TimeSpan)

      The timeout for allocation of compute nodes to the pool.

    • targetDedicated
      Nullable<Int32>
      Nullable(Of Int32)

      The desired number of compute nodes in the pool.

    • enableAutoScale
      Nullable<Boolean>
      Nullable(Of Boolean)

      Whether the pool size should automatically adjust over time.

    • autoScaleFormula
      String
      String

      A formula for the desired number of compute nodes in the pool.

    • autoScaleEvaluationInterval
      Nullable<TimeSpan>
      Nullable(Of TimeSpan)

      The time interval at which to automatically adjust the pool size according to the autoscale formula.

    • enableInterNodeCommunication
      Nullable<Boolean>

      Whether the pool permits direct communication between nodes.

      A task specified to run on each compute node as it joins the pool.

      How the Batch service distributes tasks between compute nodes in the pool.

Properties

  • Edit
    ApplicationPackageReferences
    ApplicationPackageReferences

    Gets or sets the list of application packages to be installed on each compute node in the pool.

    [JsonProperty(PropertyName = "applicationPackageReferences")]
public IList<ApplicationPackageReference> ApplicationPackageReferences { get; set; }<JsonProperty(PropertyName:="applicationPackageReferences")>
Public Property ApplicationPackageReferences As IList(Of ApplicationPackageReference)

    Property Value

    • IList<ApplicationPackageReference>
      IList(Of ApplicationPackageReference)

    Remarks

    This property is currently not supported on pools created using the virtualMachineConfiguration (IaaS) property.

  • Edit
    AutoScaleEvaluationInterval
    AutoScaleEvaluationInterval

    Gets or sets the time interval at which to automatically adjust the pool size according to the autoscale formula.

    [JsonProperty(PropertyName = "autoScaleEvaluationInterval")]
public TimeSpan? AutoScaleEvaluationInterval { get; set; }<JsonProperty(PropertyName:="autoScaleEvaluationInterval")>
Public Property AutoScaleEvaluationInterval As TimeSpan?

    Property Value

    • Nullable<TimeSpan>
      Nullable(Of TimeSpan)

    Remarks

    The default value is 15 minutes. The minimum and maximum value are 5 minutes and 168 hours respectively. If you specify a value less than 5 minutes or greater than 168 hours, the Batch service returns an error; if you are calling the REST API directly, the HTTP status code is 400 (Bad Request).

  • Edit
    AutoScaleFormula
    AutoScaleFormula

    Gets or sets a formula for the desired number of compute nodes in the pool.

    [JsonProperty(PropertyName = "autoScaleFormula")]
public string AutoScaleFormula { get; set; }<JsonProperty(PropertyName:="autoScaleFormula")>
Public Property AutoScaleFormula As String

    Property Value

    • String
      String

    Remarks

    This property must not be specified if enableAutoScale is set to false. It is required if enableAutoScale is set to true. The formula is checked for validity before the pool is created. If the formula is not valid, the Batch service rejects the request with detailed error information. For more information about specifying this formula, see 'Automatically scale compute nodes in an Azure Batch pool' (https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/batch-automatic-scaling/).

  • Edit
    CertificateReferences
    CertificateReferences

    Gets or sets the list of certificates to be installed on each compute node in the pool.

    [JsonProperty(PropertyName = "certificateReferences")]
public IList<CertificateReference> CertificateReferences { get; set; }<JsonProperty(PropertyName:="certificateReferences")>
Public Property CertificateReferences As IList(Of CertificateReference)

    Property Value

    • IList<CertificateReference>
      IList(Of CertificateReference)

    Remarks

    For Windows compute nodes, the Batch service installs the certificates to the specified certificate store and location. For Linux compute nodes, the certificates are stored in a directory inside the task working directory and an environment variable AZ_BATCH_CERTIFICATES_DIR is supplied to the task to query for this location. For certificates with visibility of 'remoteUser', a 'certs' directory is created in the user's home directory (e.g., /home/{user-name}/certs) and certificates are placed in that directory.

  • Edit
    CloudServiceConfiguration
    CloudServiceConfiguration

    Gets or sets the cloud service configuration for the pool.

    [JsonProperty(PropertyName = "cloudServiceConfiguration")]
public CloudServiceConfiguration CloudServiceConfiguration { get; set; }<JsonProperty(PropertyName:="cloudServiceConfiguration")>
Public Property CloudServiceConfiguration As CloudServiceConfiguration

    Property Value

    • CloudServiceConfiguration
      CloudServiceConfiguration

    Remarks

    This property and virtualMachineConfiguration are mutually exclusive and one of the properties must be specified. This property cannot be specified if the Batch account was created with its poolAllocationMode property set to 'UserSubscription'.

  • Edit
    DisplayName
    DisplayName

    Gets or sets the display name for the pool.

    [JsonProperty(PropertyName = "displayName")]
public string DisplayName { get; set; }<JsonProperty(PropertyName:="displayName")>
Public Property DisplayName As String

    Property Value

    • String
      String

    Remarks

    The display name need not be unique and can contain any Unicode characters up to a maximum length of 1024.

  • Edit
    EnableAutoScale
    EnableAutoScale

    Gets or sets whether the pool size should automatically adjust over time.

    [JsonProperty(PropertyName = "enableAutoScale")]
public bool ? EnableAutoScale { get; set; }<JsonProperty(PropertyName:="enableAutoScale")>
Public Property EnableAutoScale As Boolean?

    Property Value

    • Nullable<Boolean>
      Nullable(Of Boolean)

    Remarks

    If true, the autoScaleFormula property must be set. If false, the targetDedicated property must be set. The default value is false.

  • Edit
    EnableInterNodeCommunication
    EnableInterNodeCommunication

    Gets or sets whether the pool permits direct communication between nodes.

    [JsonProperty(PropertyName = "enableInterNodeCommunication")]
public bool ? EnableInterNodeCommunication { get; set; }<JsonProperty(PropertyName:="enableInterNodeCommunication")>
Public Property EnableInterNodeCommunication As Boolean?

    Property Value

    • Nullable<Boolean>
      Nullable(Of Boolean)

    Remarks

    Enabling inter-node communication limits the maximum size of the pool due to deployment restrictions on the nodes of the pool. This may result in the pool not reaching its desired size. The default value is false.

  • Edit
    Id
    Id

    Gets or sets a string that uniquely identifies the pool within the account.

    [JsonProperty(PropertyName = "id")]
public string Id { get; set; }<JsonProperty(PropertyName:="id")>
Public Property Id As String

    Property Value

    • String
      String

    Remarks

    The ID can contain any combination of alphanumeric characters including hyphens and underscores, and cannot contain more than 64 characters. The ID is case-preserving and case-insensitive (that is, you may not have two pool IDs within an account that differ only by case).

  • Edit
    MaxTasksPerNode
    MaxTasksPerNode

    Gets or sets the maximum number of tasks that can run concurrently on a single compute node in the pool.

    [JsonProperty(PropertyName = "maxTasksPerNode")]
public int ? MaxTasksPerNode { get; set; }<JsonProperty(PropertyName:="maxTasksPerNode")>
Public Property MaxTasksPerNode As Integer?

    Property Value

    • Nullable<Int32>
      Nullable(Of Int32)

    Remarks

    The default value is 1. The maximum value of this setting depends on the size of the compute nodes in the pool (the vmSize setting).

  • Edit
    Metadata
    Metadata

    Gets or sets a list of name-value pairs associated with the pool as metadata.

    [JsonProperty(PropertyName = "metadata")]
public IList<MetadataItem> Metadata { get; set; }<JsonProperty(PropertyName:="metadata")>
Public Property Metadata As IList(Of MetadataItem)

    Property Value

    • IList<MetadataItem>
      IList(Of MetadataItem)

    Remarks

    The Batch service does not assign any meaning to metadata; it is solely for the use of user code.

  • Edit
    NetworkConfiguration
    NetworkConfiguration

    Gets or sets the network configuration for the pool.

    [JsonProperty(PropertyName = "networkConfiguration")]
public NetworkConfiguration NetworkConfiguration { get; set; }<JsonProperty(PropertyName:="networkConfiguration")>
Public Property NetworkConfiguration As NetworkConfiguration

    Property Value

    • NetworkConfiguration
      NetworkConfiguration
  • Edit
    ResizeTimeout
    ResizeTimeout

    Gets or sets the timeout for allocation of compute nodes to the pool.

    [JsonProperty(PropertyName = "resizeTimeout")]
public TimeSpan? ResizeTimeout { get; set; }<JsonProperty(PropertyName:="resizeTimeout")>
Public Property ResizeTimeout As TimeSpan?

    Property Value

    • Nullable<TimeSpan>
      Nullable(Of TimeSpan)

    Remarks

    This timeout applies only to manual scaling; it has no effect when enableAutoScale is set to true. The default value is 15 minutes. The minimum value is 5 minutes. If you specify a value less than 5 minutes, the Batch service returns an error; if you are calling the REST API directly, the HTTP status code is 400 (Bad Request).

  • Edit
    StartTask
    StartTask

    Gets or sets a task specified to run on each compute node as it joins the pool.

    [JsonProperty(PropertyName = "startTask")]
public StartTask StartTask { get; set; }<JsonProperty(PropertyName:="startTask")>
Public Property StartTask As StartTask

    Property Value

    • StartTask
      StartTask

    Remarks

    The task runs when the node is added to the pool or when the node is restarted.

  • Edit
    TargetDedicated
    TargetDedicated

    Gets or sets the desired number of compute nodes in the pool.

    [JsonProperty(PropertyName = "targetDedicated")]
public int ? TargetDedicated { get; set; }<JsonProperty(PropertyName:="targetDedicated")>
Public Property TargetDedicated As Integer?

    Property Value

    • Nullable<Int32>
      Nullable(Of Int32)

    Remarks

    This property must have the default value if enableAutoScale is true. It is required if enableAutoScale is false.

  • Edit
    TaskSchedulingPolicy
    TaskSchedulingPolicy

    Gets or sets how the Batch service distributes tasks between compute nodes in the pool.

    [JsonProperty(PropertyName = "taskSchedulingPolicy")]
public TaskSchedulingPolicy TaskSchedulingPolicy { get; set; }<JsonProperty(PropertyName:="taskSchedulingPolicy")>
Public Property TaskSchedulingPolicy As TaskSchedulingPolicy

    Property Value

    • TaskSchedulingPolicy
      TaskSchedulingPolicy
  • Edit
    UserAccounts
    UserAccounts

    Gets or sets the list of user accounts to be created on each node in the pool.

    [JsonProperty(PropertyName = "userAccounts")]
public IList<UserAccount> UserAccounts { get; set; }<JsonProperty(PropertyName:="userAccounts")>
Public Property UserAccounts As IList(Of UserAccount)

    Property Value

    • IList<UserAccount>
      IList(Of UserAccount)
  • Edit
    VirtualMachineConfiguration
    VirtualMachineConfiguration

    Gets or sets the virtual machine configuration for the pool.

    [JsonProperty(PropertyName = "virtualMachineConfiguration")]
public VirtualMachineConfiguration VirtualMachineConfiguration { get; set; }<JsonProperty(PropertyName:="virtualMachineConfiguration")>
Public Property VirtualMachineConfiguration As VirtualMachineConfiguration

    Property Value

    • VirtualMachineConfiguration
      VirtualMachineConfiguration

    Remarks

    This property and cloudServiceConfiguration are mutually exclusive and one of the properties must be specified.

  • Edit
    VmSize
    VmSize

    Gets or sets the size of virtual machines in the pool. All virtual machines in a pool are the same size.

    [JsonProperty(PropertyName = "vmSize")]
public string VmSize { get; set; }<JsonProperty(PropertyName:="vmSize")>
Public Property VmSize As String

    Property Value

    • String
      String

    Remarks

    For information about available sizes of virtual machines for Cloud Services pools (pools created with cloudServiceConfiguration), see Sizes for Cloud Services (http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/cloud-services-sizes-specs/). Batch supports all Cloud Services VM sizes except ExtraSmall. For information about available VM sizes for pools using images from the Virtual Machines Marketplace (pools created with virtualMachineConfiguration) see Sizes for Virtual Machines (Linux) (https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/virtual-machines-linux-sizes/) or Sizes for Virtual Machines (Windows) (https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/virtual-machines-windows-sizes/). Batch supports all Azure VM sizes except STANDARD_A0 and those with premium storage (STANDARD_GS, STANDARD_DS, and STANDARD_DSV2 series).

Methods

  • Edit
    Validate()
    Validate()

    Validate the object.

    public virtual void Validate()Public Overridable Sub Validate

    Exceptions

    • Microsoft.Rest.ValidationException
      Microsoft.Rest.ValidationException

      Thrown if validation fails
